      • isConnected

        @RequestMapping(value="/connected",
                method=GET)
public String isConnected(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(name="origin")
                                                                                          String origin,
                                                                                          @RequestParam(name="destination")
                                                                                          String destination)
        Parameters:
        response - current HttpServletResponse object
        origin - origin city
        destination - destination
        Returns:
        "yes" for connected; "no" for any other cases
